CodingNotes: EPU; ED; antenatal clinic; fertility clinic; mixed
prospective cohort; retrospective cohort; case-control; RCT secondary analysis

Description: Number of women with threatened miscarriage at baseline
CodingNotes: If all are TM, same as sample_size_total

Description: Number who miscarried by primary outcome time
Number with ongoing pregnancy beyond outcome time

Examples: Viable IUP, vaginal bleeding, GA 5–12 weeks

Description: Mean or median maternal age at recruitment
CodingNotes: Record unit (years); specify mean/median in notes

Description: SD or IQR of maternal age
CodingNotes: Specify SD or IQR in notes
If reported, capture as text or proportions

Description: Number with abdominal pain at presentation

Examples: BP, HR recorded but not in model

CodingNotes: e.g. FHR present; CRL > x mm

Description: How GA was assessed on ultrasound
Whether GS–CRL discordance used as predictor
Number with subchorionic hematoma at baseline

CodingNotes: max diameter; area; volume; % of GS
small; moderate; large; or numerical cut-offs
number of markers or platform used

Description: How omics information entered in model
CodingNotes: single markers; composite score; ML feature set
logistic regression; Cox; CART; random forest; SVM; neural network; other
single-marker accuracy; multivariable clinical model; ML model; validation-only

Description: List of predictors included in final model
CodingNotes: Age, GA, FHR, progesterone, prior miscarriage, etc.
Examples: Age; GA; FHR; progesterone; prior miscarriage

CodingNotes: clinical judgement; stepwise; LASSO; tree-based; etc.
regression equation; nomogram; score chart; app; decision tree
e.g. miscarriage <14 weeks; <16 weeks; before viability

Description: Gestational age at end of follow-up for primary outcome
Number with miscarriage by primary definition
Number with ongoing pregnancy beyond primary outcome time
Area under ROC curve for main model/marker
Positive predictive value at main cut-off
Negative predictive value at main cut-off
Positive likelihood ratio at main cut-off
Negative likelihood ratio at main cut-off

Examples: yes; clinical net benefit > treat-all for risks 5–20%

Description: Net benefit values at key thresholds
CodingNotes: If given, record for selected threshold(s)

Description: Key comments on reporting quality / TRIPOD adherence
Examples: No sample size justification; incomplete handling of missing data
